benchmark_details.name: ACPBench
benchmark_details.overview: ACPBench is a benchmark for evaluating reasoning tasks in the field of planning, consisting of 7 reasoning tasks over 13 planning domains. It allows for the synthesis of problems with provably correct solutions, constructed from formal representations in Planning Domain Definition Language (PDDL).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve language modelsâ€™ ability to plan and reason in various planning contexts.

data.source: Automatically generated from formal representations of planning domains in PDDL with templates crafted by researchers.

methodology.calculation: Metrics computed based on performance against multiple-choice and boolean questions in various planning scenarios as defined in the benchmark.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better reasoning capabilities in planning tasks.
methodology.validation: Comparison against multiple existing large language models (LLMs).
